content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Emilia Müller. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Magdeburg to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's discuss the rental price. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student, so I am on a tight budget. I am offering 400 euros per month for the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 400 euros per month is below my expectations for this apartment. It is a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, which is a prime location. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the value of the property. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. But as a student, I am on a tight budget. I increase my offer to 450 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 450 euros per month is still below my asking price for such a prime location. The apartment's proximity to all important facilities, such as the supermarket and public transportation, adds significant value. Would you consider offering closer to 500 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 500 euros per month is too high for me. I am not asking for an apartment with a balcony or a view. I accept your offer of 475 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but 475 euros per month is still not reflective of the market value for this apartment. The city center location is highly sought after, and I believe the apartment deserves a higher rent. Would you be open to meeting in the middle at 490 euros per month? This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 490 euros per month sounds fair to me. I agree to the price of 490 euros per month!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm glad we could reach an agreement. The apartment will be rented for 490 euros per month. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
